text: The periodic table contains 118 known elements.
Photosynthesis converts sunlight into chemical energy.
The human body is composed of approximately 60% water.
Unicorns are real animals that live in the forest.
The Internet was invented by Al Gore.
Gravity is a fundamental force that attracts objects with mass.
The temperature at which water freezes is 0 degrees Celsius.
The Loch Ness Monster is a real dinosaur that survived extinction.
Antarctica is the coldest continent on Earth.
The human eye can see ultraviolet light.
